createContract.description: Create a new contract from a template in eSignatures

props.name: templateId
props.description: The ID of the template to use for the contract

props.name: title
props.description: Unique title for the contract (defaults to template title if not specified)

props.name: locale
props.description: Language setting for the signer page and emails

props.name: metadata
props.description: Custom data to attach to the contract

props.name: expiresInHours
props.description: Sets the expiry time (in hours) for the contract

props.name: assignedUserEmail
props.description: Email to assign management of the contract

props.name: labels
props.description: Labels to assign to the contract (for grouping)

props.name: test
props.description: Mark as test/demo contract with no fees charged

props.name: saveAsDraft
props.description: Save as draft instead of sending to signers

props.name: signers
props.description: List of individuals required to sign (name, email, and/or mobile)

contractSigned.description: Triggers when a contract is signed

signatureReceived.description: Trigger when a singer has signed the contract

signerDeclined.description: Trigger when a signer has declined to sign the contract
